overview: The award winning performer/director Kayden Kross throws the instructional video genre on it's ear with this satiric showcasing of four of the hottest blow job styles and how to do them:  The Girlfriend Blowjob!  The Pro Blowjob!  The Sloppy Blowjob!  The Dream Blowjob!  You may just learn something!
tagline: You've Never Had A Class Like This Before!
title: How to Blow Job
